EmailTemplate.name: Introduction To Your New Business Manager (1363105361.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction To Your New Business Manager (1363105361.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi John, I have enjoyed working with you during your enrollment with MBO Partners and your project with Eden Pellets. Now that you are familiar with the basic processes, I would like to introduce you to your dedicated Business Manager, Sarah Delaney, who will help you get the most out of our business support services. She will also introduce you to MBO Access, our online community of consultants, valuable resources, and information about the organizations that use MBO to engage their consultants. As your primary point of contact, Sarah will be able to offer you in-depth guidance on our programs, serving as your advocate to support you on any day-to-day issues regarding payments, invoices, expenses, and setting up new client contracts. I have reviewed your account history with Sarah and she looks forward to working with you. Of course, I am always here to help with anything as well. Sarah will be reaching out to you soon to introduce herself and orient you to MBO Access, and she can always be reached directly at 703-793-6049 or sdelaney@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sdelaney@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBAp0Zi7v2eLqzNhjTIdZfmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaVBAuEh477KULavojTnZWp%2BlurVxR%2FTp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. It has been a real pleasure assisting you in your orientation to MBO Partners. Best regards, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
